text: The National Archive Department of the Republic of Azerbaijan () is the national archive of Azerbaijan. It is a governmental agency within the government of Azerbaijan in charge of managing, maintaining, protecting and updating national archives of the Azerbaijani nation state. The archive houses documents, maps, stamps, audio tapes, video clips, photographs and special publications. It was established on December 2, 2002. It is in the capital city Baku. ==Related pages== * List of archives in Azerbaijan * Archive * Preservation == References == == Other websites == * National Archive Department of Azerbaijan Category:Archives in Azerbaijan Category:Government agencies of Azerbaijan Azerbaijan Category:Buildings and structures in Baku Category:2002 establishments Category:2000s establishments in Azerbaijan
title: National Archive Department of Azerbaijan
